name: KeySmash
description:
The idea for this game started at a party where I was asked if I had any local multiplayer games and all I had was a laptop with no controllers. I decided to make a game that could support up to 6 players on a single keyboard.

You begin by choosing  a number of players and giving each player a number. When the game starts each player is given a color. Colored letters will appear on the screen and you have to press the letter corresponding to your color as quickly as you can.

It gets pretty crowded with more than 4 people, but that's part of the fun!
